detectors.description:
YearnRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__22.sol#661-677) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__22.sol#667)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__22.sol#670)
